item.title: Download Optical Mark Recognition C# DLL | Aspose.OMR API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.OMR to Read Human-marked Data Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.OMR and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.OMR   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: On-premise 2D Vector Graphics API | Aspose.Drawing
item.description: Support Forum Aspose.Drawing for .NET Download DLL of 2D drawing APIs identical to GDI+ to render & convert vector graphics (lines, curves, and figures) as well as multi-style text within .NET Apps. Aspose.Drawing for Java Aspose.Drawing for Java supports rendering vector graphics such as lines, curves, and figures as well as text in a variety of fonts, sizes, and styles onto raster images.

item.title: C# .NET API | LaTeX to PNG | LaTeX to SVG | Figure Rendering
item.description: Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.2 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 78.9MB Date Added: 21/2/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/tex/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-tex-for-net-23-2-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.TeX for .NET 23.2 release. File Details LaTeX to PNG & SVG Figure Rendering A generic LaTeX code fragment renderer called the Figure Renderer has been implemented.Which enables you to generalize LaTeX math formula rendering to create customized illustrations for your online publications.

item.title: Downloads ---New Releases-aspose.pub-for-.net-23.6-(dlls-only)
item.description: Aspose.PUB for .NET 23.6 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 145.72MB Date Added: 17/6/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/pub/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-pub-for-net-23-6-release-notes/ DescriptionThis ZIP file contains only the Aspose.PUB for .NET assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.PUB without the MSI installer, i.
